column1: 1. **Text Classification Using Machine Learning**: This article discusses the process of text classification using machine learning algorithms. It explains how different techniques can be used to categorize text into various predefined categories. The article provides examples and code snippets for implementing text classification models. [Source: medium.com]

2. **Text Classification with Python and Scikit-Learn**: This tutorial explains how to perform text classification using Python and the Scikit-Learn library. It covers the steps involved in preprocessing text data
column4: and evaluation. The tutorial provides code examples and explains different algorithms that can be used for text classification. [Source: towardsdatascience.com]

column1: 3. **Introduction to Text Classification**: This article provides an introduction to text classification and explains its applications in various domains. It discusses different approaches to text classification
column2: including rule-based methods and machine learning techniques. The article also highlights the challenges and considerations involved in text classification. [Source: monkeylearn.com]

column1: 4. **Text Classification Techniques**: This document presents an overview of different text classification techniques
column4: and machine learning algorithms. It discusses the advantages and limitations of each technique and provides examples of real-world applications. The document also includes references to additional resources for further reading. [Source: nlp.stanford.edu]

column1: 5. **Text Classification using Deep Learning**: This article explores the use of deep learning techniques for text classification. It discusses the architecture of deep learning models
column2: such as convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and recurrent neural networks (RNNs)
column3: and explains how they can be applied to classify text data. The article provides code examples and discusses the performance of deep learning models compared to traditional machine learning algorithms. [Source: analyticsvidhya.com]
